t: April Wine - Live: April Wine - Amazon.com Music
s: I stumbled across this gem on vinyl 15+ years ago. It was great when two songs were released on the 4 CD box set, but I never thought the whole thing would get released on CD. Sound quality is excellent, and the performance is first rate. Jerry Mercer's drums sound huge! My only compliant is with the digi-pak packaging, which doesn't hold up over time. But, despite that shortcoming, this is one I'm pleased to add to the collection. ... April Wines ...
